title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 1050.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 1050.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

The division is the single State agency designated to
administer and supervise the State plan for substance abuse services. Under
that plan, coordinated Federal and State assistance is made available to
necessary substance abuse programs directly, or through designated local
agencies on the basis of local comprehensive plans developed and submitted by
the local agency and on behalf of programs within the locality served by the
local agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
1050.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
